statements: UPDATE inventory_levels SET quantity = 50, last_updated = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = 1
UPDATE inventory_levels SET location = 'Warehouse A', quantity = 100 WHERE product_name = 'Product XYZ'
UPDATE inventory_levels SET quantity = 50, last_updated = '2022-03-15 09:30:00' WHERE product_name = 'Widget' AND location = 'Warehouse A';
UPDATE inventory_levels SET last_updated = '2022-03-16 10:00:00', quantity = 100 WHERE id = 567;
UPDATE products SET quantity = 20, price = 15.99 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE transactions SET quantity_sold = 10, transaction_date = '2022-03-15' WHERE transaction_id = 100;
UPDATE products SET quantity = quantity + 5, price = 49.99 WHERE id = 101;
UPDATE transactions SET quantity_sold = quantity_sold - 2, transaction_date = '2022-01-15 12:30:45' WHERE transaction_id = 201;

UPDATE Product SET category = 'Electronics', stock_location = 'Warehouse A' WHERE product_id = 54321;
